author: Daniel Greene
description:
Dive into this week’s Fantasy news! 🚀 Thank you Gruns for sponsoring today's video: https://gruns.co/pages/first-order?utm_source=pi&utm_term=175929 From thrilling new book announcements to jaw-dropping art reveals, we’ve got it all covered. Stay tuned as we explore the latest updates from the worlds of fantasy, sci-fi, and pop culture. Don’t forget to check out my second channel and browse my books, merch, and Patreon for more exclusive content! 🎉

🎙️ Topics Covered:

00:30 Joe Abercrombie's New Book: The legendary author teases his upcoming masterpiece. https://joeabercrombie.com/2024-in-review/

03:14 New Cradle Book: Will Wight’s latest installment is on the horizon. https://www.instagram.com/p/DEfbnfdxs4x/?igsh=MWxxbmJ6bmQyOW11eQ%3D%3D

04:42 Hyperion Art Drop: Stunning new artwork from the Hyperion universe revealed. https://x.com/binding_broken/status/1876282621673824330

05:49 Dune 4 Rumors: Could the next Dune movie move forward without Denis Villeneuve? https://www.worldofr
title: DUNE 4 COULD DROP Denis Villeneuve🏜️ New Joe Abercrombie Book💀 ~FN~
